name: Strike A Price
tag_list: pricing-intelliegence, competitor-pricing-intelligence, competitor-pricing-analysis, competitor-pricing-strategy, online-price-intelligence, cse-pricing-intelligence, price-shop-solutions, shopping-data-feed, pricing-solutions, cse-data-feed, product-data
overview:
CSE Pricing Intelligence Comparison shopping engine which account 20% revenue for any retailers is a best option to boost the sale for all retailers. Retailers who use latest technology and expert method can even boost their sale more than that of this average 20% revenue. As part of CSE campaign support for the online retailers we provide with the Pricing intelligence data to boost their sales.

Retailers Thirst Many top 500 retailers even have opted out to list in CSE which benefits them more that the Catalogue sales. This provides us a cheap and best method for sales generation in this tough economic condition.

How to get this? Just an email to get this in your table! We as an expert in pricing intelligence use the latest technology to monitor the price in the entire top rated CSE for the competitorâ€™s price for the required products. We are also dedicated in boosting your sales using good data feed management service. As a retailer boss you look on working your sales strategies and we work on providing data to support your strategies.

How we work? We have a semi automated process to provide you with the CSE data. I could get hear the your thought for â€œWhy semi automated process?â€.To answer this, Full automation is an workable solution only for a environment which is more rigid. The CSE environment is a highly volatile one which gets updated nearly 3 times a day for the price and data. The CSE urls and the product details also get changed frequently. So we need use the right mix of the manual and the automated work to intelligently get the quality and smart work.

Report Structure? We have an internal tool to store the pricing data that we collect .Once all the data are collected we format the excel sheet for the retailers expectation and provide with the report in their desired format. This will be by the account manager who is assigned for you.

Target Customers Our target customers are good knowledgeable retailers with interest to innovate the market and who has passion in the CSE campaign. We work for small and medium retailers.

Data feed Management Data feed management is soft component which goes unnoticed during the initial campaign period for most of the retailers. At the time when a retailerâ€™s get the awareness about the data feed it would be too late as he might have done with his larger portion of the campaign budget. We as an expert educate the online retailer with the nuances and the impact created by the data feed along with our strategic competitive price.This gives a confidence for the retailers about the campaign and also makes him to come up with better decisions during the campaign period which gives best result for the CSE campaign.

How to start with the Data feed Generation? A simple method is to email us with all the product attribute that you have in you database. Let our expert analyze the input file and come up with e report for the input file. Now this file can be further worked for the required data. Once this file gets updated then it would be treated as a master file for further update.

How could we measure the impact? The impact cannot be measures immediately but you can consider the conversion rate for the last month with this new data feed to the previous 1 month with the old data feed. The chances for the sales conversion would be higher.

Interested to have a try? Email to sales@strikeaprice.com
